programme.title: William Clayton (1880-1966)
programme.short_synopsis: A profile of business leader and government advisor William Clayton.
programme.medium_synopsis: A look at the life and work of William Clayton, the official who assessed the state of post-war Europe, and returned to the US to play a major role in drafting the Marshall Plan.
